Text.Page:
You help Yasring restore {@Rgn:47001$$Tirkai Forest}.

During the task, you run into Contaminated Wendigos and defeat them.

Yasring is surprised to see that the Wendigos were contaminated, heads to Thrallhold for further research.

With the trees restored, we're no longer under the shadow of death.

Yasring went to {@Rgn:47007$$Blightroar Research Station} at the meanwhile. Go to her.

Oh, and can you help us on your way There?

Have you noticed how disturbed the argons' creatures are by the faerie saplings? I think faerie magic is poisonous to them in some way. Do you suppose that's why the argons tried to destroy Seeliewood?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Perhaps."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I'm really afraid the {@linkcreature:47#2003$$contaminated gulas} are going to uproot them. Maybe you'd like to uproot the gulas first.

! You're already done with the purification?
I heard that you even defeated those gulas! You're such a big help.

I'm glad that Cheniel found hope on the purification work thanks to my Purifying Orb.

Elves that were restoring the area got contaminated and attacked the faerie saplings. That really broke his heart.

Thank you ."I'm glad I could help."

We couldn't dare proceed with the purification before the Argons fell back.

With many help, the purification is on track...but it's still dangerous.

Blightroar is a place that was once an Argon post.
Argon remnants are still there.

, I need you to talk with Rozaline.

Blightroar must be purified in order to fully restore Tirkai Forest.

Hello, .
Yasring said what?

You wouldn't expect such boldness from such a delicate person.

Hmm...as a matter of fact, I did need to go to Blightroar...but I need someone like you by my side if we're going to purify the place.

We mustn't underestimate the remnants. They're still Argons."I'll help you."

Near the Argon Shield Emitter, you'll see argonized Wendigos. I need you to take them out.

As soon as you do, we'll be able to dispatch our men and take over Blightroar.

!

I came just when you were done with the Wendigos. I thought I could gather some materials for the purification from those Wendigo Shamans.

They say that the shamans carry a fragments that can heal the pollution!

But...wait..."It's too dangerous."

No! I can handle it!

But...everything is so strange here. The fragments...it contains a very strong power which can prevent pollution. Why couldn't it stop the contamination?

And, if the Argons really retreated, they would have took the Wendigos with them. Could they have abandoned them? Or did they have an urgent mission?

I don't think this is only about the purification anymore."Go back to camp, Yasring."

Alright...

But I need to figure out just one thing.
Why the fragment didn't stop the contamination.

Please collect Shield Emitter Fragments from the Contaminated Wendigo Shamans and any other clues you can find.

I'll be waiting at camp.

!

You got the Shield Emitter Fragment! Thank you so much!
And...Wendigo skin?

I'll take a look."Take your time."

Skin! That's horrible! I guess what's really horrible is the state of it. It's badly decomposed.

So he was already dead when you killed him....

As soon as I'm finished here, I need to go to Thrallhold and investigate more on the Argon Contamination. I hope my research can stop this...

I heard news of southern Arun while I was at camp. , I wish you could go with me, but I'm afraid it's time to say goodbye.

Lots of places in the world need your help."Southern Arun?"

It was about the Scions.
Ask Rozaline for details.

. Thanks to you, this place will be purified in no time. Everyone is grateful for your help.

I hope we can meet again.
Take care!

! I was looking for you!

I got news that the Scions are grouping up at southern Arun.

Since you've dealt with them before, I assume that you'll receive orders to return to Velika soon.

Good luck.
